reviewText: I read and view just about everything I can get my hands on the subject of pinstriping. If I can gain one little piece of information out of it, it is worth the cost of the item. In my estimation, this is one of the best ones that I have viewed. Most of the info I was already  aware of but, it did have a few points that were made clearer to me on the subject. He covered more ground and was more to the point than others have been ( no offense to other authors ). I give it an A.
